question: i had a dream in mina after fajr . i was in musjid nabawi s.a.w & sheikh huzaifi was makin salaah.he was reading & i was reading from surah baqarah ayat.
answer:
QUESTION
he was reading ayat: wa bashiril lazeena amano wa amilussalihati ana lahum jannatin tajri til a few aayat below. when i woke up i was still reading or it was like these ayat was right on my tongue.what is the significance of this dream .
ANSWER


Share:
Alhamdulillah, the dream is a blessed one. If one recites Surah Baqarah in his/her dream, that person will prosper in his good deeds. He will also be given a long life span.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
